title: [Large-scale] Molecular Biology Teacher Training: Acquiring Core Skills Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental life science knowledge and experience with laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Online modules supplementing hands-on training, focusing on acquiring field-applicable molecular biology techniques

learning_goals: Explain the principles of core molecular biology laboratory techniques (DNA extraction, electrophoresis, PCR, etc.) and accurately describe step-by-step procedures.
Apply theories acquired through online learning modules in blended environments by linking them with laboratory practicals.
Design assessment criteria for student guidance by analyzing molecular biology experimental data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
